Tyrael: Oh, speaking of Rodimus... I would pretty much like to keep 
him as my personal prisoner after you're done with him.

Dreadplague once again turned towards Darkangel:

Dread: I hope he's got some real good explanations for all this clown 
talk! Weren't they the enemies just half a cycle earlier?
